update hm_managerdaily
grossreal_income = #{grossrealIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_turnover = #{totalTurnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
number_order = #{numberOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hm_managerdaily set grossreal_income = #{grossrealIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_turnover = #{totalTurnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, number_order = #{numberOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maintenanceroom_number = #{maintenanceroomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, numberlocked_stores = #{numberlockedStores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, numberrooms_availablerent = #{numberroomsAvailablerent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalnumber_guestrooms = #{totalnumberGuestrooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_disbursements = #{cashDisbursements,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cash = #{cash,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, throughout_dayrent = #{throughoutDayrent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rate_adjustment = #{rateAdjustment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hour_rate = #{hourRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, timeout_rate = #{timeoutRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nuclearnight_roomcharge = #{nuclearnightRoomcharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, compensation = #{compensation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, membership_fee = #{membershipFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods = #{goods,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, members = #{members,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, agreement_unit = #{agreementUnit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, app = #{app,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, micro_letter = #{microLetter,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, individual_traveler = #{individualTraveler,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, direct_booking = #{directBooking,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, enter = #{enter,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, daily_type = #{dailyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from hm_managerdaily where hotel_id = #{hotelId} and date_time = #{dateTime} and daily_type = ${dailyType};

SELECT id, order_placer, order_number, check_type, check_time, check_out_time, day_count, phone, ID_number, ID_number_type, order_type, clerk_ordering_name, clerk_ordering_id, members_id, memberId_or_organizationId, total_price, hotel_id, create_time, update_time, OTA, channel, subscribe_remark FROM hotel.hm_order WHERE #{startTime} <= create_time < #{endTime} AND hotel_id = #{hotelId}
